description: Astronomers have spotted GRB 250702B, a gamma-ray burst that erupted several times over two days—something never seen before. Detected by NASA’s Fermi and China’s Einstein Probe, the event defies current models of collapsing stars or black holes, hinting at an entirely new cosmic phenomenon.
title: NASA Detects Strange Gamma-Ray Burst That Defies 50 Years of Expectations

description: Perseverance rover snaps turtle-shaped rock in Jezero Crater, a geologic oddity shaped by erosion and human pareidolia. The picture was snapped on Sol 1,610, August 31, 2025, at Jezero Crater, by the rover's Sherloc and Watson instruments, fitted to its robotic arm, which capture visible and ultraviolet images of rock surfaces.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Spots Turtle-Shaped Rock in Mars’ Jezero Crater

description: A Southwest Research Institute study reveals that chasing interstellar comets like 3I/ATLAS is achievable with current rockets and instruments. Such missions could collect data on comet nuclei and comae, providing clues to the formation of other star systems. International collaborations make these rare, high-value missions increasingly realistic.
title: Scientists Say Missions to Interstellar Comets Like 3I/ATLAS Are Feasible With Existing Tech

description: Ghaati, starring Anushka Shetty, is set for OTT release on Prime Video after its theatrical run. The Telugu action-crime drama explores survival, resilience, and revenge in the Eastern Ghats, with Anushka’s commanding role at the centre of its gripping narrative.
title: Anushka Shetty’s Ghaati OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Film After its Theatrical Run

description: The iPhone 17 series launched on Tuesday, during Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event. The latest smartphone lineup includes the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. The tech giant also unveiled a new smartphone, dubbed iPhone Air, which boasts its sleek design. With the debut of the new iPhone 17 series, the company discontinued the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max. Moreover, a few storage options for last year’s standard iPhone model have also been removed.
title: Apple Discontinues 256GB iPhone 16, Keeps Option Only for Plus Model

description: Directed by Rohith Padaki and Venu, Ekka is Kannada-language action-drama movie that follows a young innocent man getting trapped in the underworld. His transformation still seeks to return to his peaceful life. Ekka was theatrically released on July 18th, 2025. It is now set to premiere on OTT platforms soon.
title: Ekka OTT Release Date: When and Where to Stream This Kannada Action-Drama Film Online?

description: NASA’s InSight mission uncovered Mars’ mantle as chaotic and fractured, resembling a Rocky Road brownie rather than a layered planet. Seismic data revealed ancient fragments, some over 4 km wide, preserved by a rigid crust for more than four billion years. The findings offer fresh insights into Mars’ explosive past and the evolution of rocky planets.
title: InSight Mission Uncovers Chaotic Structure Locked Inside Mars’ Interior

description: The iPhone 17 series was unveiled at Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event on Tuesday. The tech giant launched four new handsets — iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and the all-new iPhone Air. While the reviews of Apple’s latest flagship iPhone models aren’t out yet, alleged benchmarking scores of the entire iPhone 17 series have surfaced online. If the listings are to be believed, the iPhone 17 models may have only minor performance gains compared to the previous generation.
title: iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone Air Surface on Geekbench With Minor Performance Improvements

description: Microsoft is coming back with an Xbox broadcast at Tokyo Game Show. The Xbox Tokyo Game Show 2025 broadcast will take place on September 5. The show will feature announcements from first-party Xbox studios, along with updates from third-party partners.
title: Microsoft Announces Xbox Tokyo Game Show Broadcast: What to Expect

description: Astronomers discovered Comet Lemmon (C/2025 A6) in January, and it could soon become visible to skywatchers. Passing closest to Earth on October 20, 2025, the comet may brighten to binocular range or possibly to the naked eye. Its evolving coma and tail promise an exciting celestial show.
title: Newly Discovered Comet Lemmon Could Soon Be Visible With Binoculars

description: The Oppo Find X9 series will debut with a 7,025mAh battery on the base model and a 7,500mAh cell on the Pro. Both models will feature flat displays with ultra-narrow bezels, a titanium colourway, cold carving design, and Hasselblad-tuned cameras. They will ship with ColorOS 16 with native Apple device support, like the AirPods 4. The displays will add eye-protection and anti-motion sickness features. The Find X9 series is expected to support 80W wired charging and enhanced video capabilities.
title: Oppo Find X9, Find X9 Pro Teased; Battery Details Confirmed Ahead of Launch in China

description: Realme P3 Lite 5G is confirmed to launch in India on September 13. It is confirmed to feature a 6,000mAh battery with 45W fast charging support. The new phone will run on MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC with up to 6GB RAM. It boasts a 32-megapixel rear camera unit and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Realme P3 Lite 5G India Launch Date Announced; Confirmed to Feature MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC

description: Spotify has launched Lossless audio for Premium users in select markets, with rollout expanding to over 50 countries by October. Subscribers are notified when available and must enable it manually on each device, choosing Wi-Fi, cellular, or downloads. Lossless streams in up to 24-bit/44.1 kHz FLAC and works on mobile, desktop, tablet, and many Spotify Connect devices. Spotify recommends Wi-Fi and wired connections for the best quality, as Bluetooth compresses the audio.
title: Spotify Finally Rolls Out Lossless Audio for Premium Users in Select Regions

description: Astronomer David Kipping has proposed TARS, a sunlight-driven space slingshot. Using reflective panels spun in space, it can fling small probes at escape speed. Though Alpha Centauri is over a thousand years away, this simple, fuel-free idea could pave the way for future interstellar missions.
title: TARS: Sunlight-Powered Space Slingshot Could Propel Tiny Probes to the Stars

description: Thammudu Nithiin's survival action drama Thammudu, which is written and directed by Venu Sriram and co-produced by Dil Raju, failed miserably at the box office, in spite of its emotional core. Thammudu premiered on Netflix streaming from August 1 in Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Kannada. Its Hindi-language version is now set to stream on JioHotstar from September 12.
title: Thammudu OTT Release: Nithiin’s Action Drama Set to Stream on in Hindi on JioHotstar Soon

description: Two Much with Kajol and Twinkle is a celebrity talk show that follows bollywood celebrities engaging into candid conversations with the duo. The conversations will be unfiltered, blended with laughter, humor, and sometimes witty talk. The series will have 8 episodes in total and will premiere on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Two Much with Kajol and Twinkle OTT Release Date Is Out: All You Need to Know About This Candid Talk Show

description: Vietnam has launched a five-year pilot for regulated crypto trading, requiring all transactions in dong and allowing only licensed local firms to run exchanges. The resolution also sets strict criteria for capital, ownership, and governance. Alongside regulation, Vietnam unveiled its first Blockchain Gallery and a Satoshi Nakamoto statue, highlighting cultural engagement with digital assets.
title: Vietnam Approves Five-Year Crypto Trading Pilot Project

description: Based on specifications listed on the official website, Apple is offering a larger battery in iPhone 17 Pro models manufactured for the US compared to those it plans to sell in India. As per a report, this is due to the US-focused devices being eSIM-only, freeing up internal space occupied by the physical SIM tray.
title: Want the Best iPhone 17 Pro Battery Life? You Will Have to Buy It in the US

description: Apple introduced a new security feature alongside the iPhone 17 series launch, aimed at defending against advanced malware threats. Called Memory Integrity Enforcement (MIE), the system uses a tagging method to verify memory access attempts. Apple noted that implementing MIE required major changes to memory allocation, the A19 chip, the operating system, and development tools.
title: Apple Introduces Memory Integrity Enforcement to Protect iPhone 17 Series from Sophisticated Malware Attacks

description: Apple’s Live Translation will be available via a software update for AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods 4 with ANC, but it requires a connected iPhone to function. Users need an iPhone 15 Pro or later running iOS 26, as the feature relies on Apple Intelligence. Initially supporting English, French, German, Portuguese, and Spanish, Live Translation works by pressing both AirPods’ stems, translating detected foreign speech, and playing it back in the user’s language.
title: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 Has a Live Translation Feature That Will Come to the AirPods Pro 2, AirPods 4

description: In iOS 26, Apple has introduced a new icon tinting feature that adds a layer of customisation to the Home Screen. This feature seems to let users set an icon tint colour that matches their iPhone case or the iPhone. This new customisation feature is unlikely to function with third-party cases.
title: Apple's iOS 26 RC Update Adds Icon Tinting Feature to Match Your iPhone or MagSafe Case

description: Google recently introduced a new subscription tier for its artificial intelligence (AI) services, called Google AI Plus. The plan debuts in Indonesia, with expansion to other emerging markets expected. Positioned between the free and AI Pro tiers, it offers adjusted features and pricing, and provides the most affordable access to the Veo 3 Fast model.
title: Google AI Plus Subscription Plan Launched With Affordable Pricing, Access to Veo 3 Fast

description: The iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max can reach a 50 percent charge in about 20 minutes with a compatible 40W or higher USB-C adapter, faster than the iPhone 16 series. Apple’s new 40W Dynamic Power Adapter, priced at $39 (roughly Rs. 3,400), supports this faster charging and works with other iPhones as well. Users can also use most higher-wattage chargers, and USB-C cables are sold separately.
title: iPhone 17 Models Support Faster Wired Charging With Apple’s New Dynamic Adapter

description: Nothing Phone 3 recently started receiving the first closed beta version of the upcoming Android 16-based Nothing OS 4.0. Before that, the company CEO and Co-Founder, Carl Pei, had announced, during the launch of its current flagship, that the OS would launch in Autumn 2025, which means between September and November. Now, the UK-based phone maker has announced that the Nothing OS 4.0 will launch soon.
title: Nothing OS 4.0 With Android 16 Confirmed to Launch Soon, Design Teased Ahead of Rollout

description: Apple introduced the new iPhone 17 series at its ‘Awe Dropping’ event on Tuesday. Among the highlights is the all-new iPhone Air, featuring an ultra-slim 5.6mm profile, while carrying all of the flagship features of the other models in the lineup. However, a history of ultra-slim phone designs has shown challenges in delivering sufficient battery life. So, what about the battery life on the iPhone Air?
title: What’s the Battery Life of the New iPhone Air? Here’s What Apple Says

description: Ghost of Yotei's creative director, Nate Fox, has said in a new interview that the team at Sucker Punch celebrated GTA 6's delay. Rockstar Games delayed GTA 6 from its initial launch window of fall 2025 to May 26, 2026. Ghost of Yotei, on the other hand, will release on PS5 on October 2, 2025.
title: GTA 6 Delay Led to Celebrations at Sucker Punch, Ghost of Yotei Director Says

description: OnePlus 15 is expected to go official later this year, as the successor to the OnePlus 13. As per a tipster, the handset will arrive in three colourways — Absolute Black, Dune, and Mist Purple. The middle shade will be the one OnePlus is speculated to use in the handset’s marketing materials, and it will weigh the least. The Absolute Black and Mist Purple shades could tip the scales at 215g, each.
title: OnePlus 15 Tipped to Launch in Three Colour Options Ahead of Anticipated Debut

description: Apple announced Final Cut Camera 2.0 during its “Awe Dropping” event, marking the first major update to the professional video app introduced in June 2024. The new version brings features such as ProRes RAW video recording and genlock, limited to iPhone 17 Pro models, while several other improvements are rolling out to older iPhones, too.
title: Apple Announces Final Cut Camera 2.0, Adds ProRes RAW and Genlock Support for iPhone 17 Pro

description: Bitcoin traded at $111,700 (roughly Rs. 98.4 lakh) on Wednesday, while Ethereum held at $4,300 (roughly Rs. 3.8 lakh). Altcoins, including Solana, XRP, Dogecoin, and Binance Coin, remained stable, reflecting a muted market. Analysts pointed to weak macroeconomic data, ETF flows, and inflation expectations as factors shaping cautious sentiment.
title: Bitcoin Price Drops to $111,700 as Traders Await CPI, ECB Signals

description: Apple launched the iPhone 17 Pro in India on Tuesday, featuring a refreshed design and several upgrades over the iPhone 16 Pro. It runs on the new A19 Pro chip, while the 16 Pro uses the A18 Pro. The iPhone 17 Pro sports a brighter display, improved telephoto and selfie cameras, as well as an improved battery life. Here’s a detailed look at the differences between the two models, so you can decide if the iPhone 17 Pro is worth the upgrade.
title: iPhone 17 Pro vs iPhone 16 Pro: Major Differences You Need to Know

description: Apple's iPhone 17 series model brings battery capacity upgrades over the company's 2024 models. The iPhone 17 Pro Max, which is the flagship model of the new lineup, promises up to 37 hours of video playback time on a single charge. Here is a comparison of the advertised video playback times of the iPhone 17 models against their iPhone 16 counterparts.
title: iPhone 17 vs iPhone 16: Here Is a Quick Comparison of Advertised Video Playback Times

description: Oppo has expanded its A-series smartphone lineup in China with the launch of the new Oppo A6 GT and Oppo A6i. The former comes with a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, a 6.8-inch 120Hz AMOLED display, and a 7,000mAh battery. Meanwhile, the Oppo A6i has a 6.67-inch 120Hz LCD screen, a Dimensity 6300 chipset, and a 6,000mAh battery.  Both smartphones run on ColorOS 15, based on Android 15.
title: Oppo A6 GT Launched With Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC Alongside Oppo A6i: Price, Specifications

description: AirPods Pro 3, Apple's new true wireless stereo (TWS) headset, now replaces the AirPods Pro 2 that arrived in 2022. Apple has delisted the last generation AirPods Pro from its website. The updated lineup now includes the AirPods Pro 3, the AirPods 4, the AirPods 4 with ANC, and the AirPods Max with USB Type-C.
title: The New AirPods Lineup for 2025: AirPods Pro 3 Arrives, Pro 2 Departs

description: Apple launched the iPhone 17 range and the all-new iPhone Air on Tuesday. Following the launch of the new phones, the tech giant has discontinued certain older iPhone models. The discontinued models include iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 15.
title: Apple Discontinues These iPhone Models After iPhone 17 Launch

description: Apple's iPhone Air was presented by the company’s Industrial Designer, Abidur Chowdhury, who walked the audience through the design choices made to build the company’s slimmer smartphone. So, who is Abidur Chowdhury, the Apple employee who was tasked with introducing the iPhone Air to the world?
title: Who Is Abidur Chowdhury, the Industrial Designer Who Introduced the iPhone Air?

description: iPhone 17 series is finally here, and along with all the incremental upgrades, it also brings new colours. Apple has introduced a new iPhone Air this year, which has become the thinnest iPhone model to date. Meanwhile, there is a new unibody design on the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max, and they now come in aluminium, instead of titanium. Here’s a look at every shade of the iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
title: iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro Colours: A Look at Every New Shade

description: iPhone 17 was unveiled at Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event on September 9, featuring major upgrades over the iPhone 16. It runs on the A19 Bionic chip, has a 6.3-inch ProMotion display, and an enhanced 18MP front camera. Apple claims up to 30 hours of video playback. Here's a quick comparison between the iPhone 17 and its predecessor.
title: iPhone 17 vs iPhone 16: Which One Is Better?

description: iPhone Air vs Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is set to be the biggest rivalry this year, after Apple launched its slimmest smartphone to date on Tuesday. Apple's new smartphone lineup also includes the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Max, but the Cupertino tech giant's thinnest phone will go against the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, which was launched in May.
title: iPhone Air vs Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Design, Display, Camera, Battery, and All Specs Compared

description: Google Pixel 9 with Tensor G4 SoC and a Titan M2 security coprocessor was launched in August last year. The latest Pixel phone is confirmed to be available for purchase at a discounted rate in the country during the Flipkart Big Billion Days sale.
title: Google Pixel 9 for Under Rs. 36,000? Flipkart's Big Billion Days Deal Revealed

description: Now that the iPhone 17 has been announced. The next question is probably where it is the cheapest and most expensive. The new iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max will be up for pre-orders this Friday, September 12 and go on sale starting September 19 in India.
title: iPhone 17 Price Around the World: The Cheapest (and Most Expensive) Countries to Buy It

description: Apple debuted the iPhone 17 lineup at a special event on Tuesday. The new slate of iPhones include the base model iPhone 17, the brand-new iPhone Air, and iPhone Pro and Pro Max models. The Pro models come with a host of new features. Here are five of them that you need to know about.
title: iPhone 17 Pro: 5 Best New Features You Need to Know About

description: The iPhone 17 series has been unveiled, alongside the Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, Watch SE 3, and AirPods Pro 3. The latest lineup includes the standard iPhone 17, iPhone Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. The company has also launched the iPhone Air, which replaces the iPhone Plus variant, offering a sleek design. Compared to last year’s iPhone 16, the iPhone 17 now offers a 120Hz refresh rate display and higher base storage.
title: Is the iPhone 16 Still Worth Buying After the iPhone 17 Launch?

description: Kazakhstan’s President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has announced plans to establish a state-backed crypto reserve and build a digital “CryptoCity” in Alatau by 2026. The move will be supported by a new digital asset law, aiming to regulate blockchain, fintech, and cryptocurrency use. Experts say Kazakhstan’s strategy could influence other emerging markets, with the country seeking to balance financial innovation with stability after its earlier experience as a global Bitcoin mining hub.
title: Kazakhstan’s President Proposes Strategic Crypto Reserve, Fully Digitalised Alatau City Project

description: Alongside the new iPhone 17 lineup, Apple also introduced the A19 chipsets. There are three variants of the system on chip (SoC), with the standard version powering the iPhone 17, whereas two versions of the A19 Pro are equipped in the iPhone 17 Air and the iPhone 17 Pro models. Apple claims big improvements with its latest silicon.
title: Apple's A19 Pro Chip Explained: What It Means for Gaming and AI Performance

description: Apple typically begins pre-orders for new iPhones on the Friday following the launch event, and this year follows the same pattern. Pre-orders for the iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max will go live on September 12, with sales starting on September 19.  Here's a roundup of all the details related to pre-orders and availability.
title: How to Pre-Order iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max in India: Dates, Timings, and Offers

description: The iPhone 16 series was unveiled in September 2024, and now its successor, dubbed the iPhone 17 series, has also debuted. The iPhone 16 lineup included the standard iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max. This year, the iPhone Plus model has been replaced by the iPhone Air. The prices of the iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus have dropped after the launch of the iPhone 17 series.
title: iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus Price in India Slashed: Check New Prices

description: Apple launched the iPhone 17 Pro Max in India on Tuesday alongside the iPhone 17 Pro, base iPhone 17, and iPhone Air. The high-end model runs iOS 26 and is powered by the A19 Pro chip. It features a 48-megapixel triple rear camera and an 18-megapixel front shooter. The Pro models are said to have larger batteries due to their unibody design. Here’s a comparison of the iPhone 17 Pro Max and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, covering features and pricing.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Max vs Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra: The Ultimate Flagship Showdown

description: The iPhone 17 series has finally been launched. While the new iPhone Air stole all the headlines, Apple has introduced significant upgrades with the iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro models as well. While both handsets share several features, there are key differences in terms of processor, cameras, and most importantly, price. Here is our detailed iPhone 17 vs iPhone 17 Pro comparison.
title: iPhone 17 vs iPhone 17 Pro: All the Key Differences Explained

description: Apple’s “Awe Dropping” event on Tuesday highlighted new hardware launches, with the iPhone 17 series, Apple Watch Series 11, and AirPods Pro 3 taking centre stage. The company also confirmed release dates for iOS 26 and watchOS 26, which will power the new devices and introduce updated features, performance improvements, and a design overhaul.
title: Apple Announces iOS 26 and watchOS 26 Release Date for All Eligible Devices

description: Apple announced several new products during its ‘Awe Dropping’ event at Apple Park on Tuesday. The company introduced the latest iPhone 17 series, including a new iPhone Air model, which is the thinnest iPhone to date. Apart from this, Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3, all powered by up to S11 SoC, also debuted. Its TWS earbuds lineup also witnessed a refresh, with the introduction of the new AirPods Pro (3rd Generation). Here’s everything that was announced at the Apple event.
title: Apple Event Roundup: iPhone 17, Air, Watch Series 11, AirPods Pro 3, and India Prices

description: Apple unveiled the Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3, offering aluminium or titanium cases in sizes from 40mm to 49mm. All models feature Always-On Retina displays, health sensors like heart rate and wrist temperature, Emergency SOS, and the S10 chip with gestures such as double-tap and wrist flick. Pricing in India starts at Rs. 25,990 for the Watch SE 3, Rs. 46,900 for the Watch Series 11, and Rs. 89,900 for the Watch Ultra 3.
title: Apple Watch Series 11 vs Watch Ultra 3 vs Watch SE 3: Which New Apple Watch Should You Buy?
